Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.manex.andaman7.injector.models.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    The settings needed to connect to the server.
    Author:
    Pierre-Yves (pierreyves.derbaix@gmail.com)
    Copyright A7 Software (http://a7-software.com/)
    Date : 02/02/2015.
